example.eg: The device is difficult to manipulate with one hand.
She's manipulated by her boyfriend in everything she does.
example.egtrans: 她无论什么事都要刻意操纵自己的男朋友。

example.eg: Authorities will determine if the data has been manipulated.
example.egtrans: 数据究竟有没有被动过手脚会有权威机构来认定。

example.eg: Tell me if it hurts when I manipulate your shoulder.
example.egtrans: 在按摩肩膀时如果你感到疼就告诉我。
